title: Which are the best hindi songs to listen while driving on a rainy day? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for A2A, Totally depends if you want enjoy the rain in soothing or energetic manner. Depending on my mood following are ones I’ll prefer:  Maachis - Panni Paani Re  Jurmana - Saawan Ke Jhoole  Chandni - Lagi Aaj Sawan  Chandni - Parbat se Kaali Ghata (Totally contrasting mood from previous one from same movie)  Lagaan - Ghanan Ghanan  Mohra - Tip Tip Barsa Paani  Lamhe - Megha Re Megha  Chupke Chupke - Ab ke Baras Sawan Mein  Manzil - Rim Jhim Gire Sawan (Both male & female version)  Ijaazat - Choti si Kahani se  1942 A Love Story - Rim Jhim Rim  Farar - Main Pyaasa Tum Sawan  Rudaali - Jhooti Mooti Mitwa  Chaalbaz - Na Jaane Kahan se Aayi Hai  Naajayaz - Barsaat ke Mausam Mein  Barsaat - Barsaat Mein And always ready to watch & listen despite of rain or no rain, my all time favourite seductive rain song pictured on my favourite actor one & only Sridevi:  Thanks, hopefully you will enjoy a few :)

I would suggest, Tum jo milgaye ho by Rafi sahab.Beehgi bheegi raaton mein.O Bhavre by Yesudas.Kinare from Queen .Journey song -PikuKabon ke parindeyTere bin by Sonu NigamI just can't stop loving you by Michael JacksonCareless whisper by George MichaelO manjhi rePehla nashaDil hoom hoom kareE dil nadanYe sama by Lata ji
